name: AeroLuxMaps
0:
”Alexa, Set AeroLuxMaps brightness to 0%”
”Alexa, Set AeroLuxMaps Display Mode to Flight Conditions”
”Alexa, Set AerLuxMaps Display Mode to Temperature”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can purchase you own custom AeroLuxMap at https://www.aeroluxmaps.com. This skill supports all of the AeroLuxMaps products.

Once you have a map plugged in and connected to the internet, please sign up and register your map to enable Alexa Control. You can sign up for an account at https://prod.dashboard.aeroluxmaps.com. Select "Login In" in the top right corner to either login with an existing account or create a new account.

By Enabling this skill you can change the mode and brightness level of the AeroLux Map. Since it enables a SmartHome Device you can also add the map to routines.

To share feedback on this skill, please contact us at support@aeroluxmaps.com
